hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: I was made redundant two months ago pillbuy.com There I did three to four hours’ intensive physical and occupational therapy every day with some "concentration" or "attentiveness" exercises and tests. It was a combination of Playschool and bootcamp. The physical trainers tried to give me instructions in simple English (stretch, relax, push, pull, up, down) but the occupational therapy was more of a challenge. Word association and mental maths may be standard brain training for stroke recovery, but in Japanese it really got my damaged grey cells active again.
